supplier.title: Suppliers
supplier.description: Manage your suppliers and view their stock-in history.
supplier.createDescription: Add a new supplier to your system
supplier.name: Supplier Name
supplier.contactPlaceholder: Enter phone number, email, or address

validation.nameMinLength: Supplier name must be at least 2 characters
validation.nameMaxLength: Supplier name must not exceed 100 characters

deleteDialog.title: Delete Supplier
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
deleteDialog.permanentRemove: This action will permanently remove this supplier from the system. This cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.inUse: This supplier is currently used in {count} stock-in records. You need to remove these references before deleting this supplier.
deleteDialog.warningMessage: Please be careful, this operation cannot be rolled back.
deleteDialog.cannotDeleteMessage: This supplier is currently in use and cannot be deleted.
deleteDialog.successMessage: The supplier "{name}" has been deleted successfully

detailDialog.title: Supplier Details
detailDialog.noStockInRecords: No stock-in records found for this supplier
detailDialog.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred while fetching supplier details
